symbols.name: OPTIONS_USE_DFG

symbols.name: OPTIONS_USE_JIT

symbols.name: OPTIONS_USE_LLINT
symbols.summary: Allows the LLINT to be used if %TRUE. Option type: %JSC_OPTION_BOOLEAN Default value: %TRUE.
